src:
Dolar AS Menguat Tipis ke Rp 14.025
05 Nov 2019, 02:54 by Zulfi Suhendra


Foto: Dolar AS/

Jakarta - Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 14.025. Demikian dikutip dari data perdagangan Reuters, Selasa (4/11/2019).Rupiah terhadap dolar hari ini tercatat lebih kuat dibanding posisi penutupan perdagangan pada Senin kemarin yang ada di level Rp 14.055.Dolar AS dalam dua pekan terakhir tercatat bergerak stabil di bawah level Rp 14.100. Secara point to point dibandingkan setahun yang lalu, mata uang Paman Sam bergerak di rentang Rp 13.885-15.198.Gubernur BI Perry Warjiyo menjelaskan nilai tukar rupiah ke depan masih ada potensi penguatan. Simak Video "BJ Habibie Pernah Tekuk Rupiah dari Rp 15.000 Jadi Rp 6.500"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)
text:
US Dollar Strengthens Thin to Rp 14,025
05 Nov 2019, 02:54 by Zulfi Suhendra


Photo: US Dollar /

Jakarta - The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning is at the level of Rp 14,025. As quoted from Reuters trade data, Tuesday (4/11/2019). The rupiah against the dollar today was recorded stronger than the position of the close of trade on Monday which was at the level of Rp 14,055. Rp 14,100. On a point-to-point basis compared to a year ago, Uncle Sam's currency moved in the range of Rp 13,885-15,198. BI Governor Perry Warjiyo explained that the rupiah exchange rate in the future was still potential for strengthening. Check out the video "BJ Habibie Ever Brought Rupiahs from Rp. 15,000 to Rp. 6,500" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (zlf / zlf)
